Experiment Method.Assay Method: In vitro cell culture and functional assays

Material used.Description: Experiments used cell culture models to assess mitochondrial respiration, ATP synthesis, proteasome function, and a-synuclein aggregation.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Defects in PINK1 lead to mitochondrial dysfunction and proteasome impairment.
Readout description.Result Description: Mutant PINK1 or knock-down caused deficits in mitochondrial respiration, ATP synthesis, and increased a-synuclein aggregation.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Custom (based on standard mitochondrial function and proteasome activity benchmarks)

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Custom (e.g., 50% reduction in mitochondrial respiration or ATP synthesis, increased a-synuclein aggregation)
